document.masterDocTitle: A review of the genus Agnathus (Coleoptera: Pyrochroidae: Agnathinae), with description of Agnathus secundus sp. nov. from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of the genus Agnathus (Coleoptera: Pyrochroidae: Agnathinae), with description of Agnathus secundus sp. nov. from China

subSubSection.paragraph:
Agnathides Lacordaire, 1859: 524 (key), 531 (as ‘Tribu III.’ in ‘Famille L. Pythides’; characters). Type genus:
Agnathus Germar, 1825
.

Agnathides: MULSANT & REY (1866a) : 268 (key), 269 (characters), 282 (list; in ‘Tribu des Simplicitarses’); MULSANT & REY (1866b) : 6 (list), 180 (key), 181 (characters; in ‘Tribu des Simplicitarses’).

Cononotini LeConte, 1862: 254 (characters; in Pythidae ; with genus
Cononotus
only). Type genus:
Cononotus LeConte, 1851
.

Cononotini: LECONTE & HORN (1883) :402 (key); 403 (characters;in Pythidae ;with genus
Cononotus
only); ABDULLAH (1974) : 22 (key), 23 (catalogue; in Anthicidae : Lagrioidinae ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Cononotinae :
SEIDLITZ (1917) : 87
(as ‘Unterfam. Cononotini’ in Pythidae and probaly separate family; with genus
Cononotus
only);
BLAIR (1928) : 28
(catalogue; in Pythidae ; with genus
Cononotus
only);
DOYEN (1979) : 39
(comment; in Pedilidae ); IABLOKOFF- KHNZORIAN (1985): 197 (key), 222 (revision; characters; in Pythidae );
YOUNG & POLLOCK (1991) : 2238
(comment; in Pyrochroidae );
LAWRENCE & NEWTON (1995) : 899
(junior synonym of Agnathinae ).
